WorkItem.ClosedComment: This should be fixed for next release, but I would suggest loading the character fresh from armory as the old character xml has some conflicting data regarding random suffix items.
WorkItem.Description:

Comments.Message: I've just noticed another problem - I've respecced the character a while ago, removing points from arcane concentration and putting them in pyromaniac.  after reimporting - the points were not removed from arc conc but were added to pyromaniac.
Is this with the WPF or SL version or both?
Occurs with both.  The attached character file will exhibit the same behaviour without reloading from armory.
